name: LampLighter (itch) (letseatlabs)
description:
The goal is to light all of the lamps in the campsite so you can go back to bed!

Controls:
- Movement: WASD
- Sprint: Left Shift
- Look Around: Mouse
- Interact: E
- Toggle Torch: F
- Crouch: Left Control

Submission for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1. This game is missing a bad guy and missing some sounds. But the original quest objective is there and it is a complete experience that can be finished.

Thanks!
